links.quantification: Cool roofs → 2-7°C temperature reduction → 30% AC load cut → 15 GW peak demand avoided
UHI reduction → 3-5°C city cooling → lower ozone formation → improved air quality
Passive cooling → thermal comfort without AC → heat-related deaths reduced 40% → vulnerable populations protected
Low-cost intervention: ₹30K/roof retrofit → scalable to all buildings → municipal budget-friendly
Aesthetic resistance: White roofs oppose traditional aesthetics → cultural pushback → policy acceptance challenges
Peak reduction → grid stability → enables more RE → less fossil backup → emissions decline (virtuous cycle)
Requires building code integration: Cool roofs need mandatory codes + OC linkage → Telangana enforcement model replication
Via UHI reduction: Lower temperatures → less outdoor activity restriction → community mobility improves
Via cooling: Less heat stress → urban tree survival +20% → canopy expansion → bird habitat
